mapper.select: select * from t_petclinic where petClinicCode = #{petClinicCode} limit 1

select * from t_petclinic where name like CONCAT('%','${petClinic.name}','%') or petClinicAddress like CONCAT('%','${petClinic.petClinicAddress}','%') or telephone like CONCAT('%','${petClinic.telephone}','%')
mapper.update: update t_petclinic set petClinicCode = #{petClinic.petClinicCode}, name = #{petClinic.name}, petClinicAddress = #{petClinic.petClinicAddress}, telephone = #{petClinic.telephone}, introduction = #{petClinic.introduction}, petClinicPhotos = #{petClinic.petClinicPhotos} where id = #{petClinic.id}
update t_petclinic set status = #{petClinic.status} where id = #{petClinic.id}
